title: Looking for Intelligent Human Being.
body:
Haven't played this game since late 2014 and am looking to make a comeback without wasting too much time or jumping straight into ranked and impeding the progress of others.

Was hoping to find an intelligent person to help me learn the current meta and achieve form once more. 

Was Gold once upon a time, now I'm just a potato. Thanks.

replies.body: Intelligence in the league community? Don't make me laugh.

> [{quoted}](name=Deviera,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=anBcv9nH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-28T08:04:54.882+0000)
>
> Intelligence in the league community? Don't make me laugh.

Logged in to upvote this
check that other thread theres some stuff. just play bruiser rengar its borderline op
That's quite a lot to ask :) You could try watching stuff on youtube or go to lol-coaching.com. Gonna have to spend some time my friend, nothing worthwhile is easy.
I think we all make mistakes and like no one is perfect, just people who were born to play league, then this must mean the potato doesn't deserve to be gold or ranked higher once more. :P
